"Lorem Ipsum is simply dummy text of the printing and typesetting industry. Lorem Ipsum has been the industry's standard dummy text ever since the 1500s, when an unknown printer took a galley of type and scrambled it to make a type specimen book."
*Make sure to read all instructions before attempting the quiz

NIMBUS is the annual technical festival of National Institute of Technology, Hamirpur, Himachal Pradesh, India. It is an amalgamation of ideas, expressions, innovations, prototypes, knowledge channels, taken to the most premier levels. Nimbus has become the biggest technical fest of Northern India.

Please read below instruction very carefully:-

 • There will be 10 questions in total.

 • Select only one option.

 • The quiz will be online and there is a time limit for each question.

 • Back button should not be pressed.

 • You will get to play the quiz once in a day.

 • Score of each day will be added and updated on leaderboard.

 • For any queries/complaints/bugs, contact us at appteam.nith@gmail.com

* Keep yourself updated with all the happenings of NIMBUS 2k18.

 * Add your Nimbus projects along with a description and image of same.

 * Add important news and announcement of various events organised during Nimbus.

 * Exciting cash prizes for the posts with maximum likes.
